# Carbon Copy - Complete AI Documentation

> Beautiful vintage form UI components for React
> Package: @prnv/carbon-copy
> Version: 0.0.1
> License: MIT

## Overview

Carbon Copy is a React component library for building authentic carbon copy forms with typewriter aesthetics. Inspired by 1970s automotive build orders, invoices, and vintage business documents. The library prioritizes information density, visual hierarchy, and practical beauty.

## Installation

```bash
npm install @prnv/carbon-copy
# or
yarn add @prnv/carbon-copy
# or
pnpm add @prnv/carbon-copy
```

## Setup

```tsx
// 1. Import styles in your root layout
import '@prnv/carbon-copy/styles.css';

// 2. Import components
import { 
  FormField, 
  VintageTable, 
  VintageTableRow,
  VintageTableCell,
  Checkbox,
  DenseGrid,
  DenseGridCell,
  FormLayout,
  FormLayoutArea,
  SectionHeader,
  StrikethroughCell,
  YearBadge,
  OptionRow,
  CodeTable,
  CodeTableRow,
  LabeledInput,
  PatternedField,
  FormSection,
  FormGrid,
  FormGridItem,
  CompactSection,
  SubHeader,
  SectionTitle,
  DirectionalArrow,
} from '@prnv/carbon-copy';
```

---

## Complete Component Reference

### FormField

Text input with multiple style variants.

```tsx
interface FormFieldProps {
  value: string;
  onChange: (value: string) => void;
  label?: string;
  variant?: 'underline' | 'boxed' | 'minimal' | 'handwriting' | 'dotted' | 'none';
  size?: 'xs' | 'sm' | 'md' | 'lg';
  align?: 'left' | 'center' | 'right';
  placeholder?: string;
  disabled?: boolean;
  readOnly?: boolean;
  className?: string;
}
```

Usage:
```tsx
<FormField 
  label="Customer Name"
  value={name}
  onChange={setName}
  variant="underline"
  size="md"
  align="left"
/>
```

Variants explained:
- `underline`: Classic underlined input (default)
- `boxed`: Input with full border
- `minimal`: No visible borders
- `handwriting`: Cursive/italic font style
- `dotted`: Dotted underline
- `none`: No styling at all

---

### Checkbox

Checkbox with X or checkmark styles.

```tsx
interface CheckboxProps {
  checked: boolean;
  onChange: (checked: boolean) => void;
  markStyle?: 'x' | 'check';
  size?: 'sm' | 'md' | 'lg';
  disabled?: boolean;
}
```

Usage:
```tsx
<Checkbox 
  checked={isSelected}
  onChange={setIsSelected}
  markStyle="x"
  size="md"
/>
```

---

### VintageTable

Dense data table with vintage styling.

```tsx
interface VintageTableProps {
  variant?: 'default' | 'dense' | 'dotted';
  background?: 'default' | 'none' | 'paper';
  children: React.ReactNode;
}

interface VintageTableRowProps {
  children: React.ReactNode;
}

interface VintageTableCellProps {
  variant?: 'default' | 'header' | 'subheader' | 'red';
  align?: 'left' | 'center' | 'right';
  children: React.ReactNode;
}
```

Usage:
```tsx
<VintageTable variant="dense" background="none">
  <thead>
    <VintageTableRow>
      <VintageTableCell variant="header">Column 1</VintageTableCell>
      <VintageTableCell variant="header">Column 2</VintageTableCell>
    </VintageTableRow>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
    <VintageTableRow>
      <VintageTableCell>Data 1</VintageTableCell>
      <VintageTableCell align="center">Data 2</VintageTableCell>
    </VintageTableRow>
  </tbody>
</VintageTable>
```

---

### StrikethroughCell

Cell with cross-hatch pattern for unavailable/N/A options.

```tsx
interface StrikethroughCellProps {
  direction?: 'both' | 'diagonal-up' | 'diagonal-down' | 'horizontal' | 'vertical';
  density?: 'sparse' | 'normal' | 'dense';
  children?: React.ReactNode;
}
```

Usage:
```tsx
<StrikethroughCell direction="both" density="normal" />
```

---

### DenseGrid

Zero-gap CSS grid for dense layouts.

```tsx
interface DenseGridProps {
  columns: string; // CSS grid-template-columns value
  collapsed?: boolean; // Removes gaps
  bordered?: boolean; // Adds outer border
  children: React.ReactNode;
  className?: string;
}

interface DenseGridCellProps {
  padding?: 'none' | 'xs' | 'sm' | 'md';
  size?: 'xs' | 'sm' | 'md';
  weight?: 'normal' | 'bold';
  textColor?: 'default' | 'red' | 'muted';
  borderTop?: boolean;
  borderRight?: boolean;
  borderBottom?: boolean;
  borderLeft?: boolean;
  bordered?: boolean; // All borders
  colSpan?: number;
  rowSpan?: number;
  align?: 'left' | 'center' | 'right';
  valign?: 'top' | 'middle' | 'bottom';
  children: React.ReactNode;
}
```

Usage:
```tsx
<DenseGrid columns="1fr 1fr 1fr" collapsed bordered>
  <DenseGridCell padding="sm" borderRight borderBottom>
    Cell 1
  </DenseGridCell>
  <DenseGridCell padding="sm" borderRight borderBottom>
    Cell 2
  </DenseGridCell>
  <DenseGridCell padding="sm" borderBottom>
    Cell 3
  </DenseGridCell>
</DenseGrid>
```

---

### FormLayout

Template-based form layouts.

```tsx
interface FormLayoutProps {
  template: 'header-2col' | 'footer' | 'custom';
  bordered?: boolean;
  children: React.ReactNode;
}

interface FormLayoutAreaProps {
  border?: 'none' | 'left' | 'right' | 'top' | 'bottom';
  align?: 'start' | 'center' | 'end';
  children: React.ReactNode;
}
```

Usage:
```tsx
<FormLayout template="header-2col" bordered>
  <FormLayoutArea>Left content</FormLayoutArea>
  <FormLayoutArea border="left">Right content</FormLayoutArea>
</FormLayout>
```

---

### SectionHeader

Styled section headers.

```tsx
interface SectionHeaderProps {
  variant?: 'primary' | 'dark' | 'navy' | 'light';
  size?: 'sm' | 'md' | 'lg';
  children: React.ReactNode;
}
```

Usage:
```tsx
<SectionHeader variant="navy" size="md">
  Section Title
</SectionHeader>
```

---

### SectionTitle

Smaller section titles for subsections.

```tsx
interface SectionTitleProps {
  color?: 'navy' | 'red' | 'default';
  size?: 'xs' | 'sm' | 'md';
  border?: 'none' | 'top' | 'bottom' | 'all';
  suffix?: string;
  children: React.ReactNode;
}
```

---

### SubHeader

Sub-section headers with optional includes/also-see references.

```tsx
interface SubHeaderProps {
  color?: 'navy' | 'red' | 'default';
  size?: 'xs' | 'sm' | 'md';
  border?: 'none' | 'top' | 'bottom';
  hasIncludes?: boolean;
  alsoSee?: string;
  children: React.ReactNode;
}
```

---

### OptionRow

Label + code option rows for dense option lists.

```tsx
interface OptionRowProps {
  label: string;
  code?: string;
  prefix?: string;
  hasCheckbox?: boolean;
  checked?: boolean;
  onCheck?: (checked: boolean) => void;
  size?: 'xs' | 'sm' | 'md';
}
```

Usage:
```tsx
<OptionRow 
  label="Air Conditioning" 
  code="C60" 
  hasCheckbox 
  checked={false}
/>
```

---

### CodeTable

Table for code/description pairs.

```tsx
interface CodeTableProps {
  compact?: boolean;
  border?: 'none' | 'all';
  children: React.ReactNode;
}

interface CodeTableRowProps {
  code: string;
  label: string;
  hasCheckbox?: boolean;
  checked?: boolean;
  onCheck?: (checked: boolean) => void;
}
```

Usage:
```tsx
<CodeTable compact>
  <CodeTableRow code="M35" label="Turbo Hydra-Matic" hasCheckbox />
  <CodeTableRow code="M40" label="4-Speed" hasCheckbox checked />
</CodeTable>
```

---

### LabeledInput

Label + input combination component.

```tsx
interface LabeledInputProps {
  label: string;
  value: string;
  onChange: (value: string) => void;
  variant?: 'underline' | 'boxed' | 'none';
  labelWidth?: 'sm' | 'md' | 'lg';
  layout?: 'horizontal' | 'vertical';
}
```

---

### YearBadge

Decorative year badge for headers/footers.

```tsx
interface YearBadgeProps {
  year: string;
  preliminary?: boolean;
  subtitle?: string;
  variant?: 'default' | 'light';
}
```

Usage:
```tsx
<YearBadge 
  year="1970" 
  preliminary 
  subtitle="Model Year"
/>
```

---

### PatternedField

Field with cross-hatch background pattern.

```tsx
interface PatternedFieldProps {
  pattern?: 'crosshatch' | 'diagonal' | 'grid';
  density?: 'sparse' | 'normal' | 'dense';
  children?: React.ReactNode;
}
```

---

### DirectionalArrow

Decorative directional arrow.

```tsx
interface DirectionalArrowProps {
  direction?: 'up' | 'down' | 'left' | 'right';
  size?: 'sm' | 'md' | 'lg';
  color?: string;
}
```

---

### FormSection

Wrapper for form sections with headers.

```tsx
interface FormSectionProps {
  title: string;
  headerVariant?: 'primary' | 'navy' | 'dark';
  children: React.ReactNode;
}
```

---

### FormGrid

Grid wrapper for form layouts.

```tsx
interface FormGridProps {
  columns?: number | string;
  gap?: 'none' | 'xs' | 'sm' | 'md';
  children: React.ReactNode;
}

interface FormGridItemProps {
  colSpan?: number;
  children: React.ReactNode;
}
```

---

### CompactSection

Compact section wrapper.

```tsx
interface CompactSectionProps {
  title?: string;
  titleColor?: 'navy' | 'red';
  hasAsterisk?: boolean;
  border?: 'none' | 'top' | 'all';
  padding?: 'none' | 'xs' | 'sm';
  children: React.ReactNode;
}
```

---

## Theming

### CSS Variables

Override these CSS custom properties to customize the look:

```css
:root {
  /* Colors */
  --cc-color-primary: #324D88;      /* Primary blue */
  --cc-color-secondary: #1E3A5F;    /* Navy blue */
  --cc-color-accent: #8B1538;       /* Maroon red */
  --cc-color-background: #A8D5D8;   /* Teal background */
  --cc-color-surface: #F5F2E8;      /* Paper surface */
  --cc-color-text: #324D88;         /* Primary text */
  --cc-color-text-muted: #6B8BC8;   /* Muted text */
  --cc-color-border: #324D88;       /* Border color */
  --cc-color-error: #8B1538;        /* Error/red */
  --cc-color-success: #2D5A27;      /* Success/green */
  
  /* Fonts */
  --cc-font-typewriter: "Berkeley Mono", "American Typewriter", "Courier Prime", monospace;
  --cc-font-mono: "Berkeley Mono", "IBM Plex Mono", "Consolas", monospace;
  --cc-font-handwriting: "Caveat", "Dancing Script", cursive;
  
  /* Spacing */
  --cc-spacing-xs: 0.25rem;
  --cc-spacing-sm: 0.5rem;
  --cc-spacing-md: 1rem;
  --cc-spacing-lg: 1.5rem;
  --cc-spacing-xl: 2rem;
}
```

### Preset Themes

```tsx
import { themes, generateCSSVariables } from '@prnv/carbon-copy';

// Available themes: default, sepia, dark, minimal
const cssVars = generateCSSVariables(themes.sepia);
```

#### Sepia Theme
```css
:root {
  --cc-color-primary: #5C4033;
  --cc-color-background: #F4E9D9;
  --cc-color-surface: #FFF8F0;
  --cc-color-text: #4A3728;
}
```

#### Dark Theme
```css
:root {
  --cc-color-primary: #7EB8DA;
  --cc-color-background: #1A1A2E;
  --cc-color-surface: #16213E;
  --cc-color-text: #E8E8E8;
}
```

#### Minimal Theme
```css
:root {
  --cc-color-primary: #333333;
  --cc-color-background: #FFFFFF;
  --cc-color-surface: #F5F5F5;
  --cc-color-text: #333333;
}
```

---

## Layout Patterns

### 2-Column Header

```tsx
<DenseGrid columns="1fr 1fr" collapsed bordered>
  <DenseGridCell padding="md" borderRight>
    {/* Dealer/Customer info */}
    <FormField label="Name" value={name} onChange={setName} />
    <FormField label="Address" value={address} onChange={setAddress} />
  </DenseGridCell>
  <DenseGridCell padding="none">
    {/* Order details grid */}
    <DenseGrid columns="80px 100px" collapsed>
      <DenseGridCell padding="xs" borderBottom borderRight>Date</DenseGridCell>
      <DenseGridCell padding="xs" borderBottom>1-17-70</DenseGridCell>
    </DenseGrid>
  </DenseGridCell>
</DenseGrid>
```

### Multi-Column Options

```tsx
<DenseGrid columns="1fr 1fr 1fr 1fr" collapsed bordered>
  <DenseGridCell borderRight>
    <SectionTitle>Model Options</SectionTitle>
    <OptionRow label="Option A" code="AA1" hasCheckbox />
  </DenseGridCell>
  <DenseGridCell borderRight>
    <SectionTitle>Transmission</SectionTitle>
    <CodeTable compact>
      <CodeTableRow code="M35" label="Auto" />
    </CodeTable>
  </DenseGridCell>
  {/* ... more columns */}
</DenseGrid>
```

### Signature Block

```tsx
<div className="signature-block">
  <FormField 
    label="Dealer Signature" 
    variant="handwriting"
    value={signature}
    onChange={setSignature}
  />
  <FormField 
    label="Date" 
    variant="underline"
    size="sm"
    value={date}
    onChange={setDate}
  />
</div>
```

---

## TypeScript Types

```tsx
import type { 
  // Theme types
  ThemeColor,
  ThemeSize,
  ThemeVariant,
  ThemeFont,
  ThemeBorder,
  ThemePattern,
  ThemeConfig,
  ThemeName,
  
  // Component props
  FormFieldProps,
  CheckboxProps,
  VintageTableProps,
  VintageTableRowProps,
  VintageTableCellProps,
  StrikethroughCellProps,
  DenseGridProps,
  DenseGridCellProps,
  SectionHeaderProps,
  // ... etc
} from '@prnv/carbon-copy';
```

---

## Best Practices

1. **Dense Layouts**: Use collapsed DenseGrid for authentic carbon copy density
2. **Typography**: Prefer typewriter fonts; use handwriting for signatures only
3. **Colors**: Navy blue (#324D88) for text, red (#8B1538) for emphasis
4. **Strikethrough**: Use StrikethroughCell for N/A or unavailable options
5. **Headers**: Use SectionHeader for major sections, SectionTitle for subsections
6. **Spacing**: Keep padding minimal (xs, sm) for dense forms
7. **Borders**: Use 1px borders consistently; 2px for outer containers

---

## Browser Support

- Chrome 90+
- Firefox 88+
- Safari 14+
- Edge 90+
